languages.text: "Один вопрос: вы понимаете, что это попадет в отчет маршалу?" {n}Железная ладонь накрывает лицо.{/n} "Или что хуже, вы хотите, чтобы это попало в отчет".
"Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the Marshal?" {n}Solomorne's iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"
languages.original_text: "Один вопрос: вы понимаете, что это попадет в отчет маршалу?" {n}Железная ладонь накрывает лицо.{/n} "Или что хуже, вы хотите, чтобы это попало в отчет".

traits.locale_text: "Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the marshal?" {n}His iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or worse, do you want this in the report?"
"Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the marshal?" {n}His iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or worse, do you want this in the report?"
"Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the marshal?" {n}His iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"

"Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the Marshal?" {n}Solomorne's iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"

languages.text: «Solo tengo una pregunta: ¿eres consciente de que esto se incluirá en el informe al Mariscal?». {n}La mano de hierro de Solomorne cubre su rostro.{/n} «O, peor, ¿quieres que esto aparezca en el informe?».
languages.original_text: "Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the Marshal?" {n}Solomorne's iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"

traits.locale_text: «Solo tengo una pregunta: ¿eres consciente de que esto se incluirá en el informe al Mariscal?». {n}La mano de hierro de Solomorne cubre su rostro.{/n} «O, peor, ¿quieres que esto aparezca en el informe?».

languages.text: “我只有一个问题要问：你知不知道，这一切都会被记录在交给元帅的报告里？”{n}索罗蒙用铁手捂住了脸。{/n}“或者说，更糟糕的问题是，你真的希望在报告里看到这些内容吗？”
languages.original_text: "Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the Marshal?" {n}Solomorne's iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"

traits.locale_text: “我只有一个问题要问：你知不知道，这一切都会被记录在交给元帅的报告里？”{n}索罗蒙用铁手捂住了脸。{/n}“或者说，更糟糕的问题是，你真的希望在报告里看到这些内容吗？”

languages.text: 「一つだけ質問です。これが将帥への報告書に載るということが分かっていますか？」{n}ソロモーンの鉄の手のひらが彼の顔を覆う。{/n}「あるいは、報告書に本当にこれを記録してほしいのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the Marshal?" {n}Solomorne's iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"

traits.locale_text: 「一つだけ質問です。これが将帥への報告書に載るということが分かっていますか？」{n}ソロモーンの鉄の手のひらが彼の顔を覆う。{/n}「あるいは、報告書に本当にこれを記録してほしいのですか？」

languages.text: « Sauf votre respect, vous avez conscience que cette petite scène sera consignée dans mon rapport au maréchal ? {n}Solomorne se couvre le visage de sa main de fer.{/n} Ou, pire encore, est-ce précisément ce que vous voulez ? »
languages.original_text: "Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the Marshal?" {n}Solomorne's iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"

traits.locale_text: « Sauf votre respect, vous avez conscience que cette petite scène sera consignée dans mon rapport au maréchal ? {n}Solomorne se couvre le visage de sa main de fer.{/n} Ou, pire encore, est-ce précisément ce que vous voulez ? »

languages.text: "Tek bir sorum var. Bunun Miralay'a vereceğim rapora gireceğinin farkında mısınız?" {n}Solomorne, demir avcuyla yüzünü kapatıyor.{/n} "Daha da kötüsü... Bunun raporda yer almasını bilinçli olarak mı istiyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the Marshal?" {n}Solomorne's iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"

traits.locale_text: "Tek bir sorum var. Bunun Miralay'a vereceğim rapora gireceğinin farkında mısınız?" {n}Solomorne, demir avcuyla yüzünü kapatıyor.{/n} "Daha da kötüsü... Bunun raporda yer almasını bilinçli olarak mı istiyorsunuz?"

languages.text: "Nur eine Frage: Ist Euch klar, dass das hier in den Bericht an den Marschall einfließen wird?" {n}Solomorne bedeckt mit seiner eisernen Handfläche das Gesicht.{/n} "Oder schlimmer noch ... wollt Ihr dass es in den Bericht einfließt?"
languages.original_text: "Just one question: are you aware that this will go into the report to the Marshal?" {n}Solomorne's iron palm covers his face.{/n} "Or, worse, do you actually want this in the report?"

traits.locale_text: "Nur eine Frage: Ist Euch klar, dass das hier in den Bericht an den Marschall einfließen wird?" {n}Solomorne bedeckt mit seiner eisernen Handfläche das Gesicht.{/n} "Oder schlimmer noch ... wollt Ihr dass es in den Bericht einfließt?"
